title: Kansai: cradle of Japanese culture
creator_credit: Iwanami Productions and Japan. National Tourist Organisation
brief_description: A colorful description of the Kansai district, including the major cities, Iso, Nara, Kyoto and Wakayama. This district was the stage for the drama of Japanese history and has been and always will be the cradle of Japanese culture.
creator_credit_for_label: Iwanami Productions and Japan. National Tourist Organisation
